trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration element that specifies the character encoding used for non-SOAP messages.
trans-unit.target: 表示配置元素，该元素指定用于非 SOAP 消息的字符编码。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 编码是将一组 Unicode 字符转换为一个字节序列的过程。

trans-unit.source: The types of encoding for non-SOAP messages are text, JSON and raw.
trans-unit.target: 非 SOAP 消息的编码类型是文本、JSON 和原始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement> represents the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebMessageEncodingBindingElement> in configuration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement> 可表示配置中的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebMessageEncodingBindingElement>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebMessageEncodingBindingElement> provides the extensibility point for plugging in a composite encoder that can be used to override how incoming message content-types map to the various inner encoders (text/JSON/raw binary) provided by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebMessageEncodingBindingElement> 可提供插入复合编码器的扩展点，此复合编码器可用于重写传入消息内容类型映射到 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 所提供的各种内部编码器（文本/JSON/原始二进制文件）的方式。

trans-unit.source: The composite message encoder does not support SOAP or WS-Addressing.
trans-unit.target: 复合消息编码器不支持 SOAP 或 WS-Addressing。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 要应用的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies the content of a specified binding element to this binding configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 将指定绑定元素的内容应用到此绑定配置节。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the binding element enabled by this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此配置元素所启用的绑定元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of binding element enabled by this configuration element: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebMessageEncodingBindingElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 此配置元素启用的绑定元素的类型：<see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebMessageEncodingBindingElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement" /> to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of the specified configuration section to this element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定配置节的内容复制到此元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of messages that can be read simultaneously without allocating new readers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定无需分配新读取器便可同时读取的最大消息数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of messages that can be read simultaneously without allocating new readers.
trans-unit.target: 无需分配新的读取器便可同时读取的最大消息数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 64.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 64。

trans-unit.source: Larger pool sizes make the system more tolerant to activity spikes at the cost of a larger working set.
trans-unit.target: 池越大，系统允许的活动峰值就越大，但工作集也会随之增大。

trans-unit.source: The `WebMessageEncodingElement` configures a composite encoder that is capable of reading and writing plain-text XML, JSON, and raw binary.
trans-unit.target: `WebMessageEncodingElement` 可配置能够读取和编写纯文本 XML、JSON 和原始二进制文件的复合编码器。

trans-unit.source: This encoder is composed of three separate encoders.
trans-unit.target: 此编码器由三个独立的编码器组成。

trans-unit.source: This setting affects the maximum number of readers for each individual encoder.
trans-unit.target: 此设置会影响每个独立编码器的最大读取器数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of messages that can be sent simultaneously without allocating new writers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定无需分配新编写器便可同时发送的最大消息数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of messages that can be sent simultaneously without allocating new writers.
trans-unit.target: 无需分配新的编写器便可同时发送的最大消息数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 16.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 16。

trans-unit.source: Larger pool sizes make the system more tolerant to activity spikes at the cost of a larger working set.
trans-unit.target: 池越大，系统允许的活动峰值就越大，但工作集也会随之增大。

trans-unit.source: The `WebMessageEncodingElement` configures a composite encoder that is capable of reading and writing plain-text XML, JSON, and raw binary.
trans-unit.target: `WebMessageEncodingElement` 可配置能够读取和编写纯文本 XML、JSON 和原始二进制文件的复合编码器。

trans-unit.source: This encoder is composed of three separate encoders.
trans-unit.target: 此编码器由三个独立的编码器组成。

trans-unit.source: This setting affects the maximum number of writers for each individual encoder.
trans-unit.target: 此设置会影响每个独立编码器的最大编写器数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可由配置了此绑定的终结点处理的 SOAP 消息的复杂性约束。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement" /> that specifies the complexity constraints.
trans-unit.target: 指定复杂性约束的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotasElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The complexity constraints include items like a maximum element depth, or a maximum length for string content within the message.
trans-unit.target: 复杂性约束包括多个项，例如最大元素深度、消息中字符串内容的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: The constraints protect against a type of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources.
trans-unit.target: 这些约束可以抵御某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type name of a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentTypeMapper" /> that specifies the format to which the content type of an incoming message is mapped.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentTypeMapper" /> 的类型名称，该映射器指定传入消息的内容类型要映射到的格式。

trans-unit.source: The type name of a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentTypeMapper" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.WebContentTypeMapper" /> 的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: This is an extensibility point in the programming model that is used by the Web message encoder to override how content types are mapped to formats.
trans-unit.target: 这是编程模型中的一个扩展点，Web 消息编码器使用它来重写将内容类型映射到格式的方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character set encoding to be used for emitting messages on the binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于在绑定上发出消息的字符集编码。

trans-unit.source: A valid <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> value that specifies the character set encoding to be used for emitting messages on the binding.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效的 <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> 值，该值指定要用于在绑定上发出消息的字符集编码。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="T:System.Text.UTF8Encoding" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="T:System.Text.UTF8Encoding" />。

trans-unit.source: The value set is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值设置为 <see langword="null" />。
